seb_mckinnon.name: Seb McKinnon
seb_mckinnon.style_description: Moody, gothic, painterly surrealism with ethereal atmosphere and dark fantasy themes

rebecca_guay.name: Rebecca Guay
rebecca_guay.style_description: Delicate watercolor and ink work with storybook and pre-Raphaelite aesthetics

terese_nielsen.name: Terese Nielsen
terese_nielsen.style_description: Saturated colors, iconic compositions with high-contrast fantasy lighting

john_avon.name: John Avon
john_avon.style_description: Luminous landscapes with atmospheric depth - you can smell the air

nils_hamm.name: Nils Hamm
nils_hamm.style_description: Eerie, atmospheric realism with strong mood design and unsettling undertones

rk_post.name: rk post
rk_post.style_description: Dark fantasy with sharp silhouettes and metal-album energy

kev_walker.name: Kev Walker
kev_walker.style_description: Gritty, dynamic figures with bold brushwork - classic modern Magic look

ron_spencer.name: Ron Spencer
ron_spencer.style_description: Grotesque horror creature work with extremely identifiable organic textures

mark_tedin.name: Mark Tedin
mark_tedin.style_description: Old-school surreal alien fantasy with early-Magic signature feel and cosmic weirdness

quinton_hoover.name: Quinton Hoover
quinton_hoover.style_description: Loose, expressive brushwork with dreamy character pieces and soft edges

zoltan_boros.name: Zoltan Boros
zoltan_boros.style_description: Dramatic realism with big cinematic scenes and dynamic lighting

steve_argyle.name: Steve Argyle
steve_argyle.style_description: Polished character portraits with crisp fantasy illustration and vibrant colors

wayne_reynolds.name: Wayne Reynolds
wayne_reynolds.style_description: Dense linework with kinetic busy compositions and explosive action

aleksi_briclot.name: Aleksi Briclot
aleksi_briclot.style_description: Sleek, cinematic concept-art style with dramatic poses and rich atmosphere

magali_villeneuve.name: Magali Villeneuve
magali_villeneuve.style_description: Ultra-detailed elegant high-fantasy realism with exquisite character rendering

drew_tucker.name: Drew Tucker
drew_tucker.style_description: Abstract experimental texture-heavy fantasy with unconventional compositions

dan_frazier.name: Dan Frazier
dan_frazier.style_description: Clean iconic artifact and iconography look with graphic design sensibility

chippy.name: Chippy
chippy.style_description: Stylized bold shapes with slightly cartoon satirical edge and strong silhouettes

cards.art_description: The image depicts a vast, open landscape with a large, skeletal structure resembling a ship or creature with tattered red sails positioned in the midground, slightly to the left. A vibrant rainbow arcs across the sky, contrasting with the dark, swirling storm clouds on the right side of the composition. The foreground features a patch of wildflowers, adding texture and a touch of softness to the otherwise desolate terrain. The overall mood is one of quiet tension, blending elements of decay and hope under a dramatic, shifting sky.

cards.oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Exile all artifacts.
• Exile all creatures.
• Exile all enchantments.
• Exile all graveyards.
cards.art_description: A young girl with long dark hair tied with white ribbons stands in the center, facing away from the viewer, holding a dandelion puff. She is surrounded by a swirling, glowing vortex of white, bird-like shapes that radiate outward from the dandelion, creating a circular motion around her. The color palette is soft and muted, dominated by pale purples, whites, and gentle earth tones, with a bright light source behind the girl casting a subtle halo effect. The atmosphere feels calm and magical, with delicate textures emphasizing the ethereal quality of the floating shapes and the girl's intricate clothing.

cards.oracle_text:
If The Prismatic Piper is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. The Prismatic Piper is the chosen color.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
cards.art_description: The image depicts a surreal humanoid figure with an elongated, smooth face and closed eyes, playing a slender trumpet-like instrument. The figure is positioned on the left side of the composition, framed by a circular, web-like halo adorned with small colored orbs. From the instrument, a dynamic, twisting stream emerges, transitioning from fiery reds and oranges on one side to cool blues and whites resembling water on the other, creating a striking contrast. The overall mood is mystical and otherworldly, with detailed textures in the flowing elements and a muted, earthy background that emphasizes the vibrant colors of the fire and water.

cards.oracle_text: All permanents are enchantments in addition to their other types.
cards.art_description: A luminous, ethereal figure with delicate, wing-like extensions stands at the center above a dark, still body of water, surrounded by glowing orbs that float gently in the air. The figure’s reflection in the water reveals intricate, root-like patterns radiating from a bright light beneath the surface, creating a mirrored connection between above and below. The background features dense, shadowy trees under a dimly lit sky with a soft, glowing moon, casting a mysterious and tranquil atmosphere. The overall scene blends natural elements with a surreal, otherworldly presence, highlighted by muted earth tones and subtle light contrasts.

cards.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, exile it.
At the beginning of each end step, if you control no creatures, sacrifice this enchantment and return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under your control.
cards.art_description: A group of robed, faceless figures stand and walk on a reflective, shallow water surface under a large, glowing full moon that dominates the background. One figure in the foreground holds a tall pole with flowing red ribbons that extend and twist in the air, adding movement to the scene. The color palette is muted with soft browns, grays, and whites, contrasted by the bright moonlight and the vivid red ribbons, creating a mysterious and ethereal atmosphere. The overall mood is quiet and contemplative, with an otherworldly, almost spiritual feeling enhanced by the misty environment and the diffuse light.

cards.oracle_text: Mythos of Vadrok deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers. If {W}{U} was spent to cast this spell, until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a large, abstract, red and beige flying creature or object dominating the upper right portion, with a long, pointed extension ending in a blue, glowing orb. Below it, a group of small, humanoid figures with elongated limbs and blue bodies gather, some raising their arms, seemingly in awe or worship. In the lower right, a cluster of small, round, thatched-roof huts is nestled against a textured, earthy background. The color palette features warm browns, reds, and beiges contrasted with cool blues, creating a mysterious and otherworldly atmosphere with intricate patterns and textures throughout.

The image depicts three towering, humanoid tree-like figures with thick trunks for bodies and large, rounded canopies of dense foliage as heads, standing prominently in a misty forest. The figures are arranged in a triangular formation, with the largest in the center foreground and two slightly smaller ones flanking it on either side, creating a focal point that draws the eye inward. The color palette is dominated by muted greens and earthy browns, with soft, diffused lighting that enhances the mysterious and ancient atmosphere. The surrounding environment features smaller trees and dense undergrowth, with a narrow, winding path leading toward the figures, adding depth and a sense of scale to the scene.

cards.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
cards.art_description: The scene depicts a surreal, nightmarish landscape filled with grotesque, skeletal creatures and humanoid figures scattered across a barren, reddish ground dotted with spikes and skulls. In the foreground, large, monstrous heads with gaping mouths and sharp teeth emerge from the earth, while smaller figures appear to be engaged in various eerie activities. The background features a massive dark circular shape resembling an eclipse, with a glowing, ominous eye and a small red orb above it, casting a dim, unsettling light over the scene. The overall palette is dominated by dark browns, reds, and muted yellows, creating a haunting and oppressive atmosphere filled with tension and unease.

A towering, skeletal creature with elongated limbs and a twisted, spiny form dominates the scene, its pale, bone-like structure contrasting against a dark, murky background. In the foreground, a small figure clad in armor and a flowing red cape stands facing the creature, emphasizing the immense scale difference. The color palette is muted and earthy, with deep browns and blacks surrounding the creature’s ghostly white and yellowish hues, creating a somber and eerie atmosphere. The environment appears desolate and shadowy, with indistinct textures suggesting decay or ruin, enhancing the sense of foreboding and tension.

cards.oracle_text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn. You become the monarch.
cards.art_description: The image depicts an elderly figure with white hair and a red patterned robe seated on the left, bowing their head over a table laden with six steaming golden goblets. On the table’s right side, a roasted pig with an exposed ribcage lies on a platter surrounded by fruit, emitting smoke that mingles with the steam from the goblets. Below the table, a group of armored knights with chainmail and helmets appear to be huddled together, some also exhaling smoke. The color palette is dominated by muted earth tones and warm golds, creating a somber and mysterious atmosphere with a sense of ritual or solemnity. The textures emphasize the roughness of the armor, the smoothness of the goblets, and the aged skin of the figure, while the background remains dark and unobtrusive.

The scene depicts a barren, foggy landscape filled with dead and leafless trees, some broken and fallen in the foreground. A large, ghostly, translucent creature with wings hovers in the misty background, partially obscured by the fog. The color palette is muted and dominated by grays, browns, and dull greens, creating a somber and eerie atmosphere. The ground is covered with sparse, dry vegetation, and the overall mood conveys desolation and quiet tension.

cards.oracle_text:
Svyelun has indestructible as long as you control at least two other Merfolk.
Whenever Svyelun attacks, draw a card.
Other Merfolk you control have ward {1}. (Whenever another Merfolk you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
cards.art_description: A mystical mermaid-like creature with elongated fins and flowing hair emerges from turbulent, dark waters, holding a black, harp-like instrument close to its chest. The figure is positioned centrally, with its serpentine tail curling through the churning sea in the foreground, while a stormy, cloud-filled sky forms the backdrop. The color palette consists mainly of muted greens, browns, and grays, with subtle highlights accentuating the creature’s delicate features and translucent fins. The overall atmosphere is eerie and otherworldly, evoking a sense of mystery and quiet power amid a wild, natural environment.

cards.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.art_description: A dense, misty jungle scene features a large, ancient stone statue with a carved face standing prominently near the center-right, partially surrounded by lush green foliage. In the background, a multi-tiered waterfall cascades down rocky cliffs, creating a soft, glowing light that filters through the tall trees and thick vegetation. The foreground includes a rocky, shallow stream with scattered plants and moss, adding texture and depth to the tranquil yet mysterious atmosphere. The overall color palette is dominated by various shades of green, with touches of earthy browns and soft whites from the mist and water.

The image depicts a rugged, mountainous landscape with three large, jagged rock formations rising sharply from the ground, resembling twisted spires or claws. These dark, pointed structures dominate the foreground, while a range of distant mountains stretches across the background under a dimly lit sky with a pale sun or moon near the horizon. The color palette is muted and earthy, with shades of brown, gray, and soft yellow, creating a somber and eerie atmosphere. The textures of the rocks appear rough and weathered, emphasizing the harshness and desolation of the environment.

cards.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
cards.art_description: The scene depicts a grand, dimly lit hall with a central throne occupied by a figure seated regally, surrounded by multiple swords embedded behind them. The throne and figure are the focal point, positioned in the middle foreground, with shadowy figures standing around in the background beneath high, vaulted ceilings illuminated by warm, flickering candlelight. The color palette is dominated by deep reds, dark browns, and muted golds, creating an intense and somber atmosphere. Notable details include the flowing red drapery or blood-like streams cascading from the throne, intricate stonework, and the heavy use of shadows that enhance the mysterious and foreboding mood.

A solitary figure clad in a red cloak stands in the foreground, holding a sword and facing a massive, gnarled tree that towers ominously in the center. The tree appears ancient and twisted, with thick, contorted branches reaching out like skeletal arms, covered in patches of moss and decay. The background is dark and shadowy, suggesting a dense, foreboding forest or swamp, with muted earth tones and dim lighting that create a mysterious and eerie atmosphere. The ground is scattered with small yellow flowers, adding a subtle contrast to the otherwise somber scene.

cards.oracle_text:
If {U}{B} was spent to cast this spell, search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.
Return up to two permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a large, fantastical creature with a reddish-brown body, multiple curved horns, and a row of small tree-like growths along its back, facing a small, black humanoid figure kneeling with hands raised toward the creature. The creature dominates the right side of the composition, while the humanoid figure is positioned on the left, both centered around two glowing white star-like shapes between them. The color palette is warm and earthy, with shades of orange, brown, and yellow creating a glowing, mystical atmosphere. Textured details include the creature’s rough, mottled skin, the delicate branches on its back, and the grainy, cave-painting-like background.

cards.oracle_text:
Exchange your hand and graveyard.
Exile Harness Infinity.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a solitary figure standing on a rocky outcrop with arms raised toward a swirling vortex in the sky, surrounded by floating elongated stones arranged in a circular pattern. The foreground features detailed trees with autumnal foliage, while the background is dominated by a dramatic sky filled with dark, swirling clouds and scattered glowing stars. The color palette is primarily warm earth tones contrasted with the luminous whites and golds of the vortex, creating a mystical and awe-inspiring atmosphere. The scene conveys a sense of cosmic power and connection between the figure and the celestial forces above, with textures ranging from the rough rock surface to the soft, glowing light.

cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, gain control of target creature for as long as this creature remains on the battlefield.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a dark, armored figure kneeling in a field of tall, delicate white flowers, with a small, ethereal fairy-like creature resting gently on its shoulder. The armored figure, clad in heavy, reflective metal with glowing eyes, is positioned in the foreground, while the translucent-winged fairy hovers close, her long blonde hair flowing behind her. The color palette is muted and somber, dominated by deep reds, dark metallic tones, and soft blues, creating a mysterious and melancholic atmosphere. The scene is detailed with textures of worn armor, fragile flower stems, and the fairy’s delicate, almost transparent wings, evoking a sense of quiet intimacy and otherworldly connection.

A towering, rocky island with a tall, narrow spire rises from turbulent, misty waters near a shoreline covered in small purple flowers and grass. The scene is set under a dark, cloudy sky with shafts of light breaking through, illuminating the island and casting a soft glow on the waves. In the background, a dense forest fades into the mist, creating a sense of depth and isolation. The overall atmosphere is mysterious and slightly eerie, with a blend of natural beauty and foreboding elements.

The image depicts a serene landscape featuring a winding river flowing through a lush forest. Trees with rounded, dense canopies frame the scene on both sides, creating a natural corridor that leads the eye toward the distant horizon. The color palette is dominated by soft greens and warm yellows, with gentle lighting suggesting either early morning or late afternoon. The atmosphere feels calm and peaceful, enhanced by the gentle reflections on the water and the soft, textured foliage.

A solitary mountain dominates the center of the image, bathed in warm golden light that highlights its rugged slopes and peaks. In the foreground, dark green foliage frames the scene, creating a contrast with the illuminated mountain and the muted, cloudy sky above. The overall atmosphere is calm and slightly mysterious, with soft shadows and a subdued color palette of earth tones and cool blues in the sky. The texture suggests a natural, untouched landscape with a sense of quiet grandeur.

cards.oracle_text: Regenerate target creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
cards.art_description: The image depicts two figures lying closely together in a lush, green environment filled with large, round leaves and plant pods. The foreground focuses on a pale-skinned woman in a white dress holding an intricately carved bow, while a darker-haired figure embraces her from behind, their long hair flowing around them. The color palette is dominated by soft greens, yellows, and muted earth tones, with gentle lighting that creates a serene yet intimate atmosphere. Notable details include the delicate textures of the plants, the flowing hair, and the subtle interaction between the two figures, suggesting a moment of quiet connection amid nature.

cards.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
cards.art_description: The image depicts two intertwined figures, one appearing humanoid with flowing hair and the other more abstract or creature-like, positioned centrally in the composition. They are surrounded by swirling, cloud-like shapes and organic forms that frame the scene, creating a sense of movement and intimacy. The dominant color is a warm brown line drawing on a light background, with varied line thickness adding depth and texture. The mood is tender and contemplative, emphasizing connection and fluidity within a softly defined environment.

The image depicts a tranquil wetland landscape under a night sky, with a bright full moon positioned near the center, casting a soft glow across the scene. In the foreground, dark silhouettes of grasses and reeds frame a reflective body of water that leads the eye toward the horizon, where clusters of trees create a natural boundary. The color palette is dominated by muted greens, blues, and browns, with the moon providing a warm yellowish light that contrasts gently with the cooler tones of the sky and land. The overall mood is calm and serene, evoking a quiet, peaceful night in nature.

cards.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a -1/-1 counter from each creature you control.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
cards.art_description: The image depicts a fantastical creature with a lion-like face, long white mane, and large tusks, combined with multiple spider-like legs and a coiled, scaled serpentine tail. The creature is positioned centrally in the composition, emerging forward against a backdrop of swirling orange clouds and a starry, greenish sky. The color palette is dominated by earthy greens, muted oranges, and pale yellows, with soft, diffuse lighting that creates an eerie, mystical atmosphere. Textural details include the creature’s shaggy fur, segmented legs, and the intricate scales of its tail, all contributing to a sense of otherworldly complexity.

cards.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
cards.art_description: The image depicts two ethereal, ghostly figures entwined in an intimate embrace, floating against a turbulent red and black background. The figures, one with flowing light hair and the other with a more translucent, glowing form, are the central focus, surrounded by swirling, smoky tendrils that extend outward, blending into the dark, cloudy environment. The dominant colors are deep reds, blacks, and pale whites, with a luminous glow emanating from the figures, creating a mystical and intense atmosphere. The scene conveys a sense of otherworldly connection and energy, with intricate, flowing lines and sparkling details enhancing the dreamlike quality.

cards.oracle_text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a graceful female figure with long flowing black hair and a delicate crown, dressed in a translucent blue gown that billows around her as if caught in a breeze. She is positioned dynamically in the foreground, with her body slightly bent and arms extended, releasing a swirl of colorful autumn leaves that trail behind her, blending into the vibrant yellow and green background. The scene is illuminated with warm, glowing light that contrasts with the cool blues of her dress, creating a sense of movement and ethereal energy. The overall atmosphere is one of serene magic and natural transformation, enhanced by the intricate details of the leaves, flowing fabric, and subtle textures of the surrounding environment.

cards.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a fallen armored warrior lying on the ground in the foreground, clad in ornate red and gold armor with a large sword resting across his body. Behind him, a ghostly, ethereal woman in flowing white robes with long dark hair appears to be emerging from or floating above swirling, turbulent waves. The scene is framed by a circular, decorative border featuring an eye motif, with a torch casting a warm glow on the right side. The color palette is dominated by deep greens, blues, and muted reds, creating a mystical and somber atmosphere filled with motion and tension.

cards.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 blue and black Faerie creature token with flying.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a fantastical humanoid figure with an elongated, ornate headpiece and intricate, delicate features, emerging from or surrounded by swirling, cloud-like formations in shades of pink, purple, and white. The figure is positioned slightly off-center, with a focus on its expressive face and extended hand reaching toward the viewer, set against a softly glowing, warm-toned background. The color palette is dominated by warm earth tones, soft pastels, and subtle highlights, creating an ethereal and otherworldly atmosphere. Fine, lace-like textures and flowing organic shapes enhance the sense of mysticism and delicate complexity within the scene.

cards.oracle_text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell.
Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)
cards.art_description: The image depicts a woman with long, flowing hair and curved horns emerging from her head, reclining against a dark, star-speckled background. She wears a red jacket, blue pants, and red high-heeled boots, with one hand extended forward, emitting a glowing blue energy. The composition centers on her dynamic pose, with her legs bent and body angled diagonally across the frame, creating a sense of movement. The color palette contrasts deep blacks and blues with vibrant reds and glowing cyan, evoking a mystical and intense atmosphere.

cards.oracle_text:
+1: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
−3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.
−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."
cards.art_description: The image depicts a dynamic scene featuring a central female figure with flowing hair, clad in an intricate, shimmering outfit that covers her body. She is positioned prominently in the foreground, reaching out with one hand while emitting a vibrant, multicolored beam of light that cuts across the composition. Surrounding her are swirling, dark, and ethereal shapes, with a ghostly, bird-like creature near her legs adding to the mysterious atmosphere. The color palette is dominated by dark tones contrasted with bright highlights from the beam and the figure’s luminous attire, creating a sense of energy and otherworldly power.

cards.oracle_text: {T}: Target red or green creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a monstrous aquatic creature with a serpentine body and elongated claws emerging from dark, murky waters in the foreground. Surrounding the creature are numerous skulls embedded in the twisted, shadowy landscape, creating a sense of menace. The background features a turbulent sky with swirling hues of orange, purple, and blue, casting an eerie, unsettling light over the scene. The overall atmosphere is ominous and foreboding, enhanced by the creature’s unsettling facial features and the dense, tangled environment.

The image depicts a powerful waterfall cascading over dark, jagged rocks into a turbulent pool below, with mist rising where the water crashes. The composition centers on the waterfall, framed by rugged rock formations on either side, creating a sense of depth and movement. The color palette features cool blues and whites of the water contrasted with deep browns and greens of the rocks and surrounding foliage, illuminated by soft, natural light. The overall mood is dynamic and invigorating, capturing the raw energy and natural beauty of a wild, untamed landscape.

cards.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a central female figure with long, flowing pale hair and a green, intricately patterned bodysuit, standing prominently against a deep teal background. She has multiple arms, some of which hold large, dark purple and black floral or wing-like shapes with delicate, detailed patterns. The composition focuses on her ethereal presence, with the additional arms and floral elements radiating outward, creating a sense of movement and complexity. The overall mood is mystical and otherworldly, enhanced by the contrast between the soft, pale skin tones and the rich, dark colors of the surrounding elements, with fine textures and subtle golden accents adding depth and intricacy.

cards.oracle_text:
Target player draws a card.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
cards.art_description: The image depicts a pale, ethereal figure with long, flowing white hair that seems to move as if caught in a gentle breeze, positioned centrally in the composition. The figure is surrounded by dense, twisting green vines and large blue flowers that envelop their body, with glowing orbs of light held delicately in their hands, creating a soft illumination against the dark, star-speckled background. The color palette is dominated by muted greens, blues, and whites, with subtle highlights that emphasize the mystical and otherworldly atmosphere. The overall mood is mysterious and enchanting, with intricate details in the foliage and the figure’s serene yet intense expression enhancing the sense of magical presence.

cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.art_description: A winged female figure with flowing golden hair and a long, pale dress dominates the foreground, holding a large sword diagonally across her body. She appears to be suspended or flying amidst a misty, ethereal environment filled with swirling blue and white hues. Dark, shadowy foliage frames the scene on either side, contrasting with the luminous, almost glowing quality of the figure and the mist around her. The overall atmosphere is mystical and intense, with a sense of motion and otherworldly power.

cards.oracle_text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a human figure with long, flowing blue hair entwined with green droplets, their body contorted in an expressive pose with one arm covering their face and the other bent above their head. The composition centers on the figure, surrounded by swirling cloud-like shapes and organic forms, creating a sense of movement and fluidity. The color palette features muted earth tones contrasted with vibrant blues and greens, while soft lighting highlights the textures of skin and hair. The overall mood conveys a mix of introspection and emotional intensity, enhanced by the dynamic arrangement and detailed, almost tactile surfaces.

A large, sturdy tree with thick, twisting branches and autumn-colored leaves dominates the left foreground, its textured bark clearly visible. The middle ground features dense, dark foliage and bushes that gradually lead to an expansive, open landscape stretching toward the horizon. The sky above is filled with soft, billowing clouds illuminated by diffused light, creating a calm and contemplative atmosphere with a muted palette of warm browns, golden yellows, and cool blues. The overall scene evokes a quiet, natural setting at either dawn or dusk, with a sense of stillness and gentle transition.

cards.oracle_text:
+2: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.
−3: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
−6: You get an emblem with "If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead."
cards.art_description: The image depicts a reclining female figure with long blonde hair and sunglasses, dressed in a textured, scale-like top and purple shorts with red gloves. She is positioned prominently in the foreground, surrounded by large, dark wings that curve around her, creating a sense of enclosure. The color palette features muted greens, purples, reds, and golds, with a glowing, almost ethereal light highlighting the figure and the intricate details of the wings and clothing. The overall mood is mysterious and otherworldly, enhanced by the detailed textures of the scales, feathers, and fabric, as well as the subtle, shimmering background elements.

cards.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue
{R}: Akroma gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.art_description: A fierce female warrior with flowing red hair stands prominently in the foreground, clad in ornate golden armor that highlights her strong, confident stance. She holds a large, glowing weapon above her head, emitting intense beams of fiery light that radiate outward, illuminating the surrounding space with warm oranges, reds, and yellows. The background is filled with swirling, smoky textures and hints of shadowy forms, creating a dynamic and powerful atmosphere charged with energy and determination.

cards.oracle_text:
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.art_description: The image depicts a cosmic scene featuring a large, intricate mechanical or celestial device at the center, emitting bright, radiant light. Surrounding this focal point are a series of spherical objects arranged in an arc, resembling phases of a moon or planets, set against a deep blue and star-filled space background. In the foreground, a cracked, barren surface contrasts with swirling, luminous energy streams that flow dynamically across the composition. The overall atmosphere conveys a sense of vastness, mystery, and cosmic power, with cool blues and bright whites dominating the color palette.

cards.oracle_text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
cards.art_description: The image depicts a powerful female warrior with long dark hair and large, ornate wings extending behind her, standing prominently in the foreground. She is clad in intricate armor with gold accents, holding a weapon in one hand, while a vast crowd of soldiers and a hazy battlefield stretch out beneath her. The color palette is dominated by soft, muted tones of gold, blue, and purple, with a glowing light source illuminating the figure and casting a mystical atmosphere. The overall mood is one of strength and determination, with detailed textures on the armor, feathers, and surrounding mist enhancing the epic and otherworldly scene.

cards.oracle_text:
+1: Untap target land you control. Until your next turn, it becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

Dominated by various shades of green and soft, diffused light filtering through the canopy, the composition centers on the interaction between the towering tree figure in the foreground and the smaller human figure, emphasizing a moment of cautious encounter. cards.oracle_text:
Any time you could cast a sorcery, you may exile a nonland card from your hand with X time counters on it, where X is its mana value. If the exiled card doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, the player may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)
Whenever chaos ensues, remove two time counters from each suspended card you own.
cards.art_description: The image depicts a vast, dark ocean with two towering, jagged rock formations emerging from the water, curving inward toward each other like claws or horns. Between these formations, a large, glowing orb of pale blue light hovers just above the turbulent waves, serving as the focal point. The color palette is dominated by deep blues, grays, and muted tones, with the orb casting an ethereal glow that illuminates the surrounding water and mist. The atmosphere is mysterious and otherworldly, evoking a sense of awe and quiet tension, with subtle details like scattered birds in the sky and rough textures on the rocky surfaces enhancing the scene’s dramatic and enigmatic mood.
